900111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish this follower if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
900111020.baseFlair_: Gliding upon the wind, as if to illuminate the canopy of the forest—but try and catch a glimpse, they'll vanish without a trace.
900111020.evoFlair_: Gliding upon the wind, gently floating as if willed by the forest itself—even now, they continue to flutter and flicker.

900131040.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if this card is in your hand, reveal it and give +0/+1 to a random allied follower.
900131040.baseFlair_:
Meeeow.
(I don't know what freedom really means... That's why I'm going to go on a journey, to see the big world out there.)
900131040.evoFlair_:
Meow.
(I thought a name is something that robs you of your freedom, but... Well, maybe it's not such a bad thing after all.)

110124010.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower with 0 attack or less.
Draw a card.
Enhance (6): Banish any enemy follower instead.
110124010.baseFlair_: Burned by tears or torn by screams, you must bear it, never decaying, for all eternity.

900134040.baseFlair_: I'm gonna fight too! Wars are filled with pain and sadness, and they make you want to run away... Still, I won't turn back—not ever! I might've shown up here on accident, but that doesn't matter. I really love this world!

900134050.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
900134050.baseFlair_: Guess I'll fight or whatever. Honestly, I've got better things to be doing, but hey, mabes there's something to all this hope stuff Chickadee's been going on about. At least I'll look cool.

900144020.baseEffect_:
Draw 2 cards.
Enhance (2): Add 2 to the number of cards played this turn.
900144020.baseFlair_: The noble shimmer of life for you, noble one. —Yggdrasil

900144030.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower +1/+0 and Rush.
Enhance (4): Then give all allied followers Storm.
900144030.baseFlair_: The noble shimmer of life must not be defiled by anyone. —Yggdrasil

900144070.baseEffect_:
Remove all effects from all followers except changes to their attack or defense and then banish all cards in play.
Banish all cards in your hand and deck.
Put copies of the first 10 cards your opponent played this match (excluding XII. Wolfraud, Hanged Man and Treacherous Reversal) into your deck, in the order they were played.
Transform the Reaper at the bottom of your deck into a Victory Card.
Treat allied cards that have been destroyed this match as if they were banished.
At the end of your opponent's next turn, put copies of each card in your opponent's hand into your hand (excluding XII. Wolfraud, Hanged Man and Treacherous Reversal).
900144070.baseFlair_:
So how's it hangin', and how do you do?
What's fact and what's fiction is up to you!
Hey... You really gonna believe that? Heck, I'm not even sure myself!
Nothing matters except satisfying yourself!

900144090.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+0 to an allied Arisa, Evergreen Arrow.
Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
900144090.baseFlair_: We might have different pasts, but we're together now; our differences won't stop us from being friends. We can make a brighter future together. That's why I’m putting everything I have—all the strength my friends have given me—into this shot!

900144120.baseEffect_:
Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, activate 1 of the following effects in order.
1. Give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
2. Draw 2 cards.
3. Restore 3 defense to your leader.
(This effect is not stackable and is removed after activating 3 times.)
900144120.baseFlair_:
The splendor of creation is the light of life.
—Yggdrasil

100111010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Fairy into your hand.
100111010.baseFlair_: Fairies get lonely, so we always stick together. If you hurt me, they won't be pleased!
100111010.evoFlair_: If you try and hurt me, we'll make you regret it. But if you're a good friend, the fairies won't forget it!

101111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
101111010.baseFlair_: Elf rules say we've gotta live as one with nature, but grown-ups get to go out into the world! Pffft, I can't wait till I'm bigger.
101111010.evoFlair_: I mean, I really like the forest! It's my home! But I wanna know what's out there so bad. So, um, I was thinking of going on an adventure! I mean, look, I'm so grown-up already, right? It'll be fine!

101111020.baseFlair_: I fight to defend the forest from the forces of darkness! I will not allow any more of my friends to be killed!
101111020.evoFlair_: I'm not going to cry any more! I'm going to keep fighting even if I don't have any strength left! Courage makes anything possible! Shield of the pixies, lend me your strength!

103111050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
103111050.baseFlair_: Look! Look how high I can climb now! Soon I'm going to be a grown-up!
103111050.evoFlair_: Once I grow up, I'm gonna leave the forest. One day I'll be a big cat girl!

111111030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to another allied follower with at least 4 attack.
Enhance (4): Give +1/+1 to all other allied followers instead.
111111030.baseFlair_: The forest is a living, breathing organism. That's why I look after its health. Just like people need doctors, the forest needs an arborist!
111111030.evoFlair_: Young Treants are bad at expressing themselves. But I understand what they mean. H-hey, what? Are those termites? Eeeww, get away!

112111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Until the end of the turn, subtract 1 from the cost of a Machina card (excluding Robotic Bagworm) in your hand.
112111030.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a tiny little insect. It began using steel in place of branches and iron instead of leaves to construct its cocoon. As a result, it was afforded protection from predators and the environment alike. —Researcher's Report, Part 1
112111030.evoFlair_: Something is strange about this forest. Today I fired an arrow at a most curious insect, and to my surprise, it deflected it! It was my first encounter with a bug sporting a metallic carapace. —Forest Notes, Part 1

115111020.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand.
115111020.baseFlair_: To an outsider, this nation must look like it's been conquered by the forest. But the people here praised my skill, saved my family, and gave me a duty to fulfill. This is the best work environment I could ask for.
115111020.evoFlair_: Here in this forest, things like social status and political power are more worthless than weeds. Even if I put an extra hole in the head of some noble who broke the law, no one would criticize me. I can't think of a better place to work.

116111030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If at least 4 other cards were played this turn, summon an Ironback Beetle.
Clash: If any other allied Machina followers are in play, gain +1/+1.
116111030.baseFlair_:
The source of the core's metamorphosis was another tiny little insect. It began wrapping its horn in steel, giving it an impressive boost in power—so much so that the little guy can bore through a live tree. What a transformation.
—Forest Elf's Journal, Part 1
116111030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116111030.evoFlair_:
Steel-covered insects, beasts clad in steel—the forest elves have but one explanation: the fauna have adopted machinery into their biology. One suspects we will soon follow suit.
—On Flourishing, Part 1

118111030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Summon a Dutiful Steed.
118111030.baseFlair_: Some stranger was commenting about the "fashionable scarecrow" out by the ranch. What's he doin' in this one-horse town? For his sake, I hope he's not here to rustle the cattle. That cactus'll do more than just spook him. —General Store Shopkeeper, Jessop Village
118111030.evoFlair_:
He doesn't eat or sleep. I reckon he's the perfect lookout; he ain't a bad shot, either. Don't waste your time feelin' sorry for trespassers—this town's prosperity comes from the ranch, after all.
—General Store Patron, Jessop Village

125111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, give all allied followers the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn - Reduce damage from effects to 0.
125111010.baseFlair_: Hiya, Leaf Man here! Why do you keep staring at me like that? You're making me turn red... But... to be honest, I don't really mind!
125111010.evoFlair_: Heya, Leaf Man again! Thanks for holding onto me! The weather's crisp and cold, but your hands are nice and warm!

127111010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, put a random Condemned follower from your deck into your hand.
127111010.baseFlair_:
You've gotta be smart to lead a life of crime. The Radiant Sun belongs to the trees; here in the shade, we're left to pick up the leftovers. Don't make more noise than you need to—that's the code of the Verdant Ring.
—Den of Winds: Memories of a Convict, Part 1
127111010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
127111010.evoFlair_:
I used to be nothing but a consort, you see... But then my husband went and got himself killed. I got out of the Ring, went clean for a while. Wasn't all that bad. The only problem was, I'd left something behind...
—Den of Winds: Memories of a Convict, Part 2

717111010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, put a random Condemned follower from your deck into your hand.
717111010.baseFlair_:
You've gotta be smart to lead a life of crime. The Radiant Sun belongs to the trees; here in the shade, we're left to pick up the leftovers. Don't make more noise than you need to—that's the code of the Verdant Ring.
—Den of Winds: Memories of a Convict, Part 1
717111010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
717111010.evoFlair_:
I used to be nothing but a consort, you see... But then my husband went and got himself killed. I got out of the Ring, went clean for a while. Wasn't all that bad. The only problem was, I'd left something behind...
—Den of Winds: Memories of a Convict, Part 2

128111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +2/+2, recover 2 play points, and evolve this follower.
128111030.baseFlair_: The bladebunny's ears can't support their own weight, and flop behind it clinking and clanking when it hops. It can hardly hear approaching predators over the din, making it an attractive target for less experienced hunters.
128111030.evoEffect_: Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
128111030.evoFlair_: You may wonder; how do the poor clunky bladebunnies evade danger? And the answer is: they don't. These pint-size predators merely act defenseless to lure out unsuspecting prey.

900111010.baseFlair_: There are fairies in forests, fountains, flower beds, and everywhere else. If you can't see them, it's because your heart is impure. Look, there's one right next to you!
900111010.evoFlair_: Trickery, moodiness, mischief—while these are all aspects of fairies' characters, what's most important is the strength of their feelings. They are highly emotional and will sacrifice their lives to help their friends and families.

117121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, gain +2/+2. Then, if at least 4 other cards were played this turn, gain +2/+2 more and Ward.
117121020.baseFlair_:
Mom told me to leave it in the forest, but she's not the boss of me! This bug's way too cool! I'm totally taking it home with me!
—A Boy's Account
117121020.evoFlair_:
He did promise to take good care of it. Boys will be boys, I guess. But I draw the line when a pet is literally bigger than the house!
—A Mother's Account

119121010.baseEffect_:
Invocation: When you play a card using its Accelerate effect for the second time this turn, invoke this card.
----------
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +X/+X. X equals the number of times you've played a card using its Accelerate effect this match.
119121010.baseFlair_:
I am Walder, brave warrior of the forest! As a ranger, it's my duty to disperse the dastardly forces that threaten this place! Prepare to kiss the blue sky goodbye!
Woo, that was awesome! Now that's what I call making an entrance!
119121010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119121010.evoFlair_: Wait for me, Jade. I'll come back with plenty of tales of my adventures! And then we can forge our own new legends, together!

125121010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, draw a card and gain the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
125121010.baseFlair_: Meowr! The forest's in trouble! I'm so scared, but... but I can't be a fraidy-cat forever, so... do your worst! I'll show you!
125121010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
125121010.evoFlair_: When I grow up, I'm gonna leave the forest! I'll go on an adventure and make lotsa friends! That's why I've gotta practice real hard right now!

128121010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied Forestcraft followers have left play this match, gain Rush.
Last Words: Put a Fairy Funfact into your hand.
128121010.baseFlair_:
I-I've never seen facilities like these... And they've got so many classes on animal handling and husbandry and, and... Everyone else really knows what they're doing. I guess I'll just go say hi to the critters in the barn...
—Vitherwood Exchange Experience
128121010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128121010.evoFlair_:
I'm glad to hear you learned so much, just... sigh Now, I know it may be hard to talk to new people, but to go the entire term speaking only to animals...
—Mr. Bertrand, Exchange Program Afterparty

129121020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Summon 3 Treasureflies.
Enhance (7): Evolve 2 random unevolved allied Treasureflies.
129121020.baseFlair_: Don't let this insect's jewel-like form fool you—the treasurefly is a ravenous beast. If you should be unfortunate enough to glimpse one, running away is strongly recommended.
129121020.evoFlair_: It flies gracefully through the forest, its compound eyes seeing all. What awaits those foolish enough to stay around is a dazzling, beautiful death—a one-way ticket to paradise.

113131010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of allied Whirlwind Rhinoceroaches you've played this match. If X is at least 5, gain Storm.
113131010.baseFlair_: The witch first gave it a simple command: usurp life. He would carry out that order faithfully—quicker and more accurately.
113131010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, return this follower to your hand.
113131010.evoFlair_: Its thorny carapace is thick and its swinging blades are sharp: it is the usurper of life. And once again it will carry out the orders of the witch.

113131030.baseEffect_:
Invocation: Whenever you play a card, if it's the fourth card you've played this turn, invoke this card and then return it to your hand.
----------
Fanfare: If at least 4 other cards were played this turn, deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower.
113131030.baseFlair_: Let's all go on an adventure. I've got snacks in my bag and a pocketful of friendship. Nothing will be scary while the three of us are together. —The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 1
113131030.evoFlair_: The are lots of dangers out on an adventure. We might even have to fight. "Let me battle it out alone!" "No way!" The travelers argue, and cracks begin to form in their friendship. —The Path to Adventure with Three, Plus One, Part 2

122131010.baseEffect_: During your turn, whenever an effect adds at least 1 Fairy to your hand from somewhere other than your deck, double the number of Fairies added. (This effect is not stackable.)
122131010.baseFlair_:
You might only see a small bud now, but it'll bloom one day, won't it?
—Mimori Amamiya
122131010.evoFlair_:
If I could blossom myself, what sort of flower do you think I'd be?
—Mimori Amamiya

122131020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Fairy into your hand. Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of Fairies in your hand.
122131020.baseFlair_:
Hehe. Of course, I don't mind playing nice. It's refreshing to have a little lighthearted fun once in a while.
—Vanessa Joubert
122131020.evoFlair_:
Are you really satisfied with matches like this? Something tells me you want more... and that's perfectly fine, you know. It's okay to lose yourself.
—Vanessa Joubert

125131010.baseEffect_: Fanfare and Last Words: Put a Fairy into your hand.
125131010.baseFlair_: Fairies are easily hurt, so we're extra careful about keeping bad people out of the forest! The moment we spot a threat, we gather our friends, and pow! Bye-bye bad guys!
125131010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
125131010.evoFlair_: Fairies get lonely, so we like having lots of friends around! We especially remember the good people! Treat a fairy right, and you'll make a ton of new friends in one day!

126131020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If X is at least 5, gain Storm. X equals the number of times an allied effect has returned 1 or more cards to a player's hand this match.
Last Words: Put a Floral Breeze into your hand.
126131020.baseFlair_:
You might be right. I probably don't have what it takes to be a club captain. I do have Light and Subaru cheering me on from the sidelines, though, so I won't just stand here feeling sorry for myself.
—Itsuki Mitsutagawa
126131020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
126131020.evoFlair_:
Now, let's settle this! Get ready for my last turn!
—Itsuki Mitsutagawa

129131010.baseEffect_: When this follower leaves play, put a Fairy into your hand and restore 1 defense to your leader. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
129131010.baseFlair_:
I won't ever forget the first time we met, Kyrie. Um, it was kind of a shock... but not in a bad way. That was the day I gained an important member of my family.
—Canon, A Hero's Tale, Pt. 5
129131010.evoEffect_: When this follower leaves play, draw a card and restore 3 defense to your leader.
129131010.evoFlair_:
I don't like the idea of you putting yourself in danger, but I understand you want to help out of the kindness of your heart. Just promise me you'll come back home, safe and sound!
—Canon, A Hero's Tale, Pt. 5

110141020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Crystalia Eve into your hand and change its cost to 3 if at least 2 other cards were played this turn. Change its cost to 1 instead if at least 4 other cards were played this turn.
110141020.baseFlair_: Beyond the glaciers, where the snowstorm leads, whatever could bring you to this place a second time? You're a strange one... but that might not be so bad. I suppose I could lend you a hand.
110141020.evoFlair_: The crystals' power is eternal. In comparison, our chance meeting is but a sigh which clouds the frozen air before dispersing. Even so... perhaps this fleeting warmth has meaning. Perhaps it is something I need.

115141030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain +0/+X. X equals the number of allied cards destroyed this match that cost 1 play point or less. Then, if X is at least 5, evolve this follower.
Can't attack the enemy leader.
115141030.baseFlair_: Joy, anger, sorrow, pleasure—they are all as one. The deep green torrent is as the forest incarnate. Its power surges and swells, playfully for now. Hidden within its elegant form is the rapture of the shuddering forest.
115141030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115141030.evoFlair_: The dragon beats its great wings and soars into the air, leaving a shower of blossoms in its wake. It laughs, shimmering bewitchingly—the mighty destroyer of those who would dare defile the forest.

118141010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, gain Storm.
Then, if at least 4 other cards were played, evolve this follower.
Then, if at least 6 other cards were played, put a Shamu's Antics and Shama's Gaze into your hand and change their costs to 1.
118141010.baseFlair_:
"Ready to play with the mousey, Shama?"
"Meow-wow! Better start running, little mousey!"
"Meow-wee! It's a lot more fun that way!"
118141010.evoFlair_:
"Mrow-wow! It's coming your way, Shamu!"
"Mrow-wee! It's really giving us a good chase!"
"We'll play with you until you can't even stand!"

120141020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If X is at least 10, put a Resolve of the Nine-Tailed Fox into your hand. X equals the number of allied Forestcraft followers that have left play this match.
120141020.baseFlair_: All anyone ever tells me are lies. Everything here is so dark and lonely, especially at night. I keep having nightmares of fangs that pierce and claws that tear. But I'll keep going... I have to, if I want to get back to where I belong.
120141020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower.
120141020.evoFlair_: The truth was a cruel, bitter pill to swallow, but I still believe. I still have dreams of my own. If I head toward them one step at a time, I know everyone will be there, waiting for me. That's why... I'm not letting you stand in my way!

716141010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If X is at least 10, put a Resolve of the Nine-Tailed Fox into your hand. X equals the number of allied Forestcraft followers that have left play this match.

128141010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied Forestcraft followers have left play this match, put a Verdant Prayer into your hand.
128141010.baseFlair_: I was dumb, and slow, and... I-I couldn't do anything about it but cry. But... no matter what anyone else said, Verdi was always there to save me. So, um... I hope I find her soon...
128141010.evoFlair_: Verdi's strong, and smart, and kind, and... she was the answer to all my prayers. I believe in her. I love her more than anyone! I love her... So I'll never give up.

Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Draw a card.
101114010.baseFlair_: Heeding the trees' call, the forest-dwellers return.

112114010.baseEffect_:
Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Draw a card.

Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Draw a card.
709114010.baseFlair_: Let me guide you, my lord. Just follow this light.

101114050.baseFlair_: C'mere, everyone! Come play with the trespasser!

110114010.baseFlair_: Recently, all manner of people have been coming through the forest, so the fairies never want for entertainment.

103114020.baseEffect_:
Give an enemy follower -10/-0 until the end of the turn.

106114010.baseFlair_: The bowstring's twang and shallow breath disappear amid the sound of rustling leaves. Wait quietly—nay, peacefully. An impatient heart is proof of trepidation. A forest warrior can have no such thing. —Elven Tactics, counterattack section

Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand. Then deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.

Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand. Then deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.

Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.

It begins as a seed, transforming into a sprout upon the barren land. When the sprout takes root, a guardian appears who has taken a vow to protect it.

I could break someone just by hugging them. I was a monster, an unnatural beast. I never wanted these paws... but that didn't make a difference.

Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.

If there's something that you really want to do, then you shouldn't feel like you have to give up on it.

Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
Restore 1 defense to your leader.

Being true to yourself no matter what is important.
Let the petals dance! Floral Breeze!

Singing spells to crops helps develop their flavor? Ooh, I'll give it a go! Aaaabra ca da-buh-di-do!

Precious, sacred, miracle of the wood.
Feeds on life to nurture light for spirits pure and good.

Paradise for them, but death for you and me.

Draw a card.

127124010.baseEffect_:
Destroy an enemy follower with 4 attack or less.
If any evolved allied followers are in play, put a random follower with at least 5 attack from your deck into your hand.
127124010.baseFlair_:
There's no point wallowing in regret! The battle's not over yet—you've still got more left in you... Give this your all!
—Itsuki Mitsutagawa

900124010.baseFlair_: You're so unfashionable I can hardly look. But just relax. You're about to be reborn a hundred times over in fashionable white. —Fashionista Nelcha

900124020.baseEffect_: Change an enemy follower's defense to 1.
900124020.baseFlair_: You're so unfashionable I can hardly bear it. But don't worry. You're about to be reborn a hundred times over in fashionable black. —Fashionista Nelcha

107134010.baseEffect_:
Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand. Restore X defense to your leader. X is the number of returned cards.
Enhance (5): Return all allied followers and amulets instead.
107134010.baseFlair_: "I'll heal you!" "Do you need healing?" "Hey, I can heal you!" "See? When we feel like it, we can do amazing things together!"

114134010.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+0 and Rush to all followers in your hand that originally cost 1 play point or less.
Enhance (4): Give +1/+0 and Storm instead.
114134010.baseFlair_:
Here... This is my first piece! It's yours!
—Rayne, Elf Smith

121134010.baseEffect_:
Add 1 to the number of cards played this turn.
At the end of this turn, if at least 4 cards were played this turn, draw a card and give +1/+1 to all allied followers. If at least 8 cards were played, instead draw 2 cards and give +2/+2 and Ward.
121134010.baseFlair_: The people called him a hero—one who'd brought peace to Isunia with a blade of justice. Setus bore this as stoically as he would any other burden. "With the Moon Corps—no, Countersolari—at our side, Isunia will know true justice." —Tales from Isunia, Entry 7

122134010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Fairy.
If at least 5 allied Forestcraft followers have left play this match, evolve it.
Then, if at least 10 have left play, restore 2 defense to your leader and draw a card.
122134010.baseFlair_: The fruits aren't forbidden because they're "bad." The lying glutton who owns them is just being greedy. Go on, try one!

123134010.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, give -1/-1 to all enemy followers. (This effect is not stackable and is removed after activating 3 times.)
123134010.baseFlair_:
"It would be a shame to see one so hardy wither; I'll do you the courtesy of killing you in your verdancy." —Izudia, Unkilling Annihilation
"Your concern is unnecessary; allow me to plant the red bloom of death in your heart." —Amataz, Reverse Blader

125134010.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if at least 4 cards were played this turn, reveal this card from your deck and put it into your hand (up to 1 copy per turn).
----------
Put a Whirlwind Assault into your deck.
Until the end of the turn, give +X/+0 to an allied Forestcraft follower that costs 1 play point or less.
Then, if X is at least 5, give it Storm.
X equals the number of other Whirlwind Assaults you've played this match.
125134010.baseFlair_: They have no bloodthirst, nor any desire for destruction. They are devoid of all will, and driven only by instinct. They are, in a word, unstoppable.

127134010.baseEffect_:
Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
If at least 10 allied Forestcraft followers have left play this match, restore 1 defense to your leader and recover 1 play point.
127134010.baseFlair_: Her Majesty is beyond reproach; she is the picture of elegance and dignity. Even the fairies know this to be true.

717134020.baseEffect_:
Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
If at least 10 allied Forestcraft followers have left play this match, restore 1 defense to your leader and recover 1 play point.
717134020.baseFlair_:
This one goes out to everybody!
—Hatsune Miku

900144040.baseEffect_:
Give an allied follower +0/+1.
If you have played at least 4 other Fils in this match, that follower can attack 2 times per turn.
900144040.baseFlair_: Oho! Let's make this a liiittle bit more chic!

900144050.baseEffect_: Restore 1 defense to your leader. Recover 1 evolution point. Draw a card.
900144050.baseFlair_:
Its light is eternal, an unparalleled brilliance that radiates for eternity.
—On Carbuncles, Cryptid Companion

900144080.baseEffect_:
Give an allied Forestcraft follower the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Then, if that follower is a Sekka, Fatebound Fox and X is at least 20, give it +4/+4 and Storm. X equals the number of allied Forestcraft followers that have left play this match.
900144080.baseFlair_: I'm not Ninetails! I'm Sekka! That's the name Mom gave me... And I'll sear it into your heart!

900144110.baseEffect_:
Randomly give -6/-0 to 1 of the highest-attack enemy followers.
Enhance (9): Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your next turn, deal 20 damage to the enemy leader.
900144110.baseFlair_: Annihilation comes of unkilling. To preserve life, we lead ourselves to the slaughter; in killing only the body, we save the spirit. We fear death, even as we hurtle toward it. If you would preserve your spirit from an ignoble death, you must take life by your own hand.

900144130.baseEffect_:
Recover 1 evolution point.
If at least 20 allied Forestcraft followers have left play this match, give +3/+3, Ward, and the following effect to all allied followers that cost 1 play point or less: Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.) Then, give +1/+1 to all allied followers that cost at least 2 play points.
900144130.baseFlair_: She's everything to me! Everything I could never be...

107113010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Whenever this card is returned to your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, put a Fairy into your hand.
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
107113010.baseFlair_: Unto the earth will the living return, and from the earth will life be born anew. The flame reducing trees to ashes; the rejoicing of fire fairies throughout the forest.

109113010.baseEffect_:
If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, and you have at least 1 play point, Choose: Play this card as a Fairy's Yawn or Fairy's Awakening.
----------
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, put a Fairy into your hand.
109113010.baseFlair_: Are they resting blissfully in a land of dreams? Or are they luring you into a devious trap? Careless eyes quickly become prey for the forest. —One-eyed Fairy Hunter

900113010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, select a random enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
900113010.baseFlair_: Even if it looks to be safe, you can never be too careful. Get entangled in their shenanigans, and you too could lose something important. —One-eyed Fairy Hunter

900113020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Whenever an enemy follower attacks your leader, deal 1 damage to that follower.
900113020.baseFlair_: When all is said and done, for them it is merely a prank—even at the cost of lives. They do however they please, so choose wisely. —One-eyed Fairy Hunter

101122020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give +1/+0 to a random allied follower with 1 attack.
101122020.baseFlair_: The kindly weedfolk are said to bestow their blessings upon those too weak to defend themselves.

106133010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Whenever this card is returned to your hand, draw a card.
At the end of your turn, give +1/+0 to a random allied follower.
Last Words: Draw a card.
106133010.baseFlair_: Fairy whispers are made of truth, tricks, and treachery. If one picks up only on their truth, ignoring the other parts, then a flicker in time becomes the same as time eternal. —Account of a fairy-handler

900143010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, give +1/+0 to all allied Forestcraft followers.
Whenever this card is returned to your hand, draw a card.
Last Words: Draw a card.
900143010.baseFlair_: A bow given to forest guardians who have passed the Tree of Life's trial. Each shot from this bow is imbued with the power of the wind, lending strength to those who would protect the sacred woodland.

100111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
100111020.baseFlair_: Hey there, little fairy! Thanks for patrolling the forest again. So how was it? Peaceful as usual today, huh?
100111020.evoFlair_: Now I know you fairies keep the forest safe, but remember to take care of yourselves! You're a part of the forest too, you know.

100111040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Ward if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
100111040.baseFlair_: We elves are practically powerless compared to other species, you know. But there is an unbreakable bond between us. When we work together, our hearts become one!
100111040.evoFlair_: The forest is our holy land. We cannot allow the forces of evil to enter it! Those who wish to do harm to nature must first do battle with the elves!

101111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
101111030.baseFlair_: You there, traveler—have you lost your way? Well, you've found the right fairy! I'll show you the way out in a flash!
101111030.evoFlair_: Look! We made it outside! Woo-hoo! Isn't this great? Huh? Me, lost? Heh, a-actually, I might've made oooone wrong turn. Ack, no, don't get mad! Look, I'll get it next time! J-just let me show you the way!

101111040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Change the cost of a Fairy in your hand to 0.
101111040.baseFlair_: Pixies, come! Assemble in my light! You have the power to drive away the forces of evil!
101111040.evoFlair_: Pixies, you have answered my call! Thank you! Now come! Let us defend the forest together!

101111070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw a card if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
101111070.baseFlair_: Our home has become polluted with the miasma of war. Mighty God Tree, we beg of you! Please restore this forest to its rightful state!
101111070.evoFlair_: It remains faint, but it can be heard—the voice of the mighty God Tree! The forest lives yet! Now come, let us use the tree's power to drive away this evil!

101111090.baseFlair_: Finally I have you cornered! You abducted my friends, and now you must pay the price! Do not believe yourselves to be safe in your stronghold! Friends, I am coming for you!
101111090.evoFlair_: I cannot storm the stronghold by myself. That much is certainly true. But I am not alone! My friends are waiting for me inside, and their fragrance shall lead me to them!

102111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an evolved allied follower is in play, select an enemy follower. It can't attack next turn.
102111010.baseFlair_: Hey, have a whiff of this! A marvelous aroma, isn't it? Hey... What's with the sour face?
102111010.evoFlair_: The next batch will smell stupendous! First comes the dash of dwarf's sweat, and then the dollop of bat's blood...

102111020.baseEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, put a Fairy into your hand.
102111020.baseFlair_: Fairies flutter into the grove, attracted by the bard's song.
102111020.evoFlair_: Fairies begin to dance, enraptured by the bard's song.

104111020.baseFlair_: Why did you come so deep into our woods? Do you want to hurt us? You shouldn't be doing that...
104111020.evoFlair_: I'm part of these woods, and they're part of me. That's why you won't get away with hurting me. You'll sleep in the earth if you try.

105111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Add 1 to the number of cards played this turn.
105111020.baseFlair_:
"Together since birth."
"Together till death."
"Two as one, what fun!"
"One as two, how fun!"
105111020.evoFlair_:
"Dee, what will today bring?"
"Loads of fun, dear Dum."
"Dee, what to do today?"
"Something fun, dear Dum."

106111010.baseEffect_: Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, draw a card.
106111010.baseFlair_: If you like me—hehe—then I'll like you back! I'll do everything I can for you!
106111010.evoFlair_: Everybody that likes me is a good person—hehe—which makes you a good person too!

107111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Until the end of the opponent's turn, give all allied followers +1/+0 and the following effect: Reduce damage from effects to 0.
107111030.baseFlair_: Hey there, Leaf Man here! Could ya spare me some water? I'm parched!
107111030.evoFlair_: Hi, Leaf Man again! Thanks for the water, that really hit the spot!

108111020.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: The enemy follower can't attack next turn.
108111020.baseFlair_: You think I'm the watcher of the spellgrove? You couldn't be more wrong. I am its ivy, the moss growing within. I am the servant that serves under it.
108111020.evoFlair_: The spellgrove sows its seeds in people. And once the flowers begin to bud, it's—no, don't come any closer. Get out, or it'll curse you too!

109111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy amulet if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
109111010.baseFlair_: Ah, such a tragedy... The trees, they wither and thirst for life because of me. Ah, what a miracle... My skin, it glows and shimmers with youth from head to toe.
109111010.evoFlair_: Oh, such agony... As you sleep, they scream because of me. Oh, such beauty... My heart, it sings a melody while my radiance awakens.

109111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Give an allied follower +1/+2. Restore 3 defense to your leader.
109111020.baseFlair_: Fairies love to revel in their mischief, but there are some who know the pleasures of serving. Myself, for example…
109111020.evoFlair_: As the years pass, some look back to realize the errors from their youth. Now let us return what was so unfairly purloined from you.

110111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give an enemy follower -1/-0 until the end of your opponent's turn.
110111020.baseFlair_: We must never kill, for all life is an act of existence. What should be, is. Let go and allow life to run its course.
110111020.evoFlair_:
The First Law: Existence
A branch that flourishes is no more worthy than one that withers. It merely is. You must view reality as it exists.
—Teachings of the Unkilling Guardian

111111010.baseEffect_: Last Words: Give -2/-0 to a random enemy follower.
111111010.baseFlair_: We must never kill. Nor may people be permitted to relinquish their lives. One's own allotment is all that is deserved.
111111010.evoFlair_: In the shadow of law looms punishment. All possession breeds inequality. Therefore humans should own nothing but their lives. Go forth, carve from them all these needless things.

112111010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and deal 2 damage to 2 random enemy followers.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
112111010.baseFlair_: The people of the forest tell me that all humans are evil, that I should shoot 'em on sight. But I don't believe that. Surely there are some good ones in the bunch! Hmm... But how do you tell them apart? Guess I'll just shoot whoever!
112111010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112111010.evoFlair_: Whew! I'm glad you're one of the good ones! If you were a bad guy, you would've been shot to bits! How do I know that? Well, the arrows fired from a daisybow never miss an evil person.

114111030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. Then if at least 2 other cards were played this turn, put a Fairy into your hand.
114111030.baseFlair_:
What terror, what fright—the great tree seen by night.
Eyes, mouth, and nose—yet silent it grows.
Mouth closed in daylight hours—once opened, devours.
—Woodland folk song
114111030.evoFlair_:
The great tree is the forest's most fearsome terror.
Possessed of eyes, nose, and mouth, still it may not speak.
That wordless mouth opens only to devour its prey.
—Songs of the Unsullied Wood (Translation)

115111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 3 other allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, gain +1/+1. Then, if at least 6 other allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, gain Ward.
115111010.baseFlair_:
The sprout bears a sapling, bringing further blessings to the land. The oathbearer trains herself to grow strong, so that she might protect this bounty of nature.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 2
115111010.evoFlair_:
The sapling extends its branches, spreading the blessings of nature along with them. If any should seek to plunder this bounty, the mighty warrior must use her strength to eliminate them.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 3

116111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Add X to the number of cards played this turn. X equals the number of allied Natura cards in play.
116111020.baseFlair_:
When spring breathes, new life grows. First a sprout, then a bud—a flower smiles at the sun. Flexing its petals, it takes to the air. Hail, Spriteling! Laugh on and dance through the treetops.
—Forest Ditty
116111020.evoFlair_:
The fairies knew it, when the forest fell to the steel revolution. But their resolve did not change, for change would compromise the unyielding nature of the land.
—The Pure Forest

117111020.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a card using its Accelerate effect, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
117111020.baseFlair_: You know, this really isn't your season. Compared to the other forest flowers in full bloom, you stick out like a sore thumb.
117111020.evoFlair_: Early bloomer, late bloomer; we all get second winds. You, on the other hand, are going to wilt while the forest explodes in color.

118111020.baseEffect_: During your turn, whenever an allied amulet leaves play, draw a card. (Transformation doesn't count as leaving play.)
118111020.baseFlair_: All right, everybody! Have you got your bags and tongs? If you need gloves, just let me know! All right, move out! We're going to make this forest sparkle!
118111020.evoFlair_: A lot of folks are leaving their trash in the forest. Tsk-tsk. But on the flip side, there are so many kindhearted friends of the forest! Thank you for your hard work, everybody!

119111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Fairy into your hand.
119111010.baseFlair_: From an outsider's point of view, you may suspect that I am a caster of curses. This is not the case. I am merely an agent of karma.
119111010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give Bane to all Fairies in your hand.
119111010.evoFlair_: What is the difference, you ask? Curses are used by humans to inflict pain on each other. Karma is simply the will of the forest, exacting judgment on humans for their wrongdoings.

120111020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
Enhance (8): Deal 5 damage instead. Then gain +3/+3 and Storm.
120111020.baseFlair_:
He said there's no point in becoming a forest guardian and left the embrace of the wood. Foul-mouthed as he is, I thought he was a good child at heart. Perhaps I was wrong...
—Forest Elder
120111020.evoFlair_:
I heard rumors on the wind of an elf swordsman who destroyed a bandit base. So, that boy left the forest to nip the threat in the bud.
—Forest Elder

121111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any other allied cards are in play, return 1 to your hand and restore 4 defense to your leader.
121111010.baseFlair_: Put a few fairybloom petals and a Leaf Man's leaf in a jar, let them brew for a while, and you get a one-hundred percent all-natural potion packed with the forest's blessings.
121111010.evoFlair_:
I got home to find holes in my roof!
—Fairybloom Dweller
Hey! Where are you going with my leaf?!
—Leaf Man

122111030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Enhance (5): Evolve this follower.
122111030.baseFlair_: Not once has this beast left its tree. Flies and maggots flock to its filth, only to be shoveled straight into its gullet.
122111030.evoFlair_: The parasites ate away at the sloth from within, taking command of its limbs to hunt—and doing all the drudgery of survival for it.

123111020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Summon a Fairy Wisp and Fairy.
123111020.baseFlair_:
"Whoever picks the prettiest flowers wins! Ready... Set... Go!"
"I'm gonna win this!" "Nuh-uh! The flower crown is mine!"
But the fairy who'd suggested the race lay down for a nap.
123111020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Return another allied follower to your hand. Banish an enemy follower. (Activates only when 2 targetable cards are in play.)
123111020.evoFlair_:
"I couldn't gather a single flower! You two are amazing!"
"Yay, we won!" "Here! Take our flowers as a consolation prize!"
The sleeping fairy got her flowers, all according to plan.

124111020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Summon a Blossom Treant and evolve it.
124111020.baseFlair_: Wow, so many trees here for their check-up! And such strong, healthy branches, too... Don't you worry, I'll keep this forest fighting fit!
124111020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
124111020.evoFlair_:
Not only the treants and flowers, but the animals too! Such a balanced, flourishing ecosystem... but who could be maintaining this forest so thoroughly?
—Lila, Arborist

125111020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower and then the enemy leader. Do this 1 time.
Enhance (4): Deal 3 damage instead.
Enhance (7): Do this 2 times instead.
125111020.baseFlair_: The grip on this machete's nice and light: good for cutting your way through the thicket. And if you want to hunt beasts, this beauty can cleave through the bones of game fowl like a knife through butter.
125111020.evoFlair_: This slim piece with the serrated edge is ideal for sawing branches off trees. If it's trespassers you want to cut down, I highly recommend this one—the curve of the blade can slash open throats with a flick of the wrist.

126111010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Treasure Map into your hand.
126111010.baseFlair_: I've been dreaming of that big city ever since I glimpsed it from the treetops. The village elder's finally agreed that I'm ready to set off on my own, and he even gave me a map! What should I do first... Boutique shopping? Dinner and a show? Oh, I can't wait!
126111010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Discard a card from your hand. Draw 2 cards.
126111010.evoFlair_:
Oh dear... That map was over fifty years old, wasn't it... Will that girl be okay?
—Village Elder

126111030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put 2 Fairies into your hand.
Enhance (8): Summon 2 Deepwood Wolves.
126111030.baseFlair_: Flying squirrels have been known to serve as messengers in times of war. This squirrel has no such desire, for it has claimed fruit from the sacred tree. Was it by the forest's will that it was able to claim such power, or did the squirrel simply pinch it from a passing fox?
126111030.evoFlair_: Once listless and lazy, the creature scuffles about no longer. It leaps to the crown of the sacred tree, a perch that may have been granted to this newly blessed forest familiar. It very well may be a position that the squirrel snatched for itself, however.

128111010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If any allied followers that cost 1 play point or less are in play, return 1 to your hand, summon a Windflower Tiger, and give it +0/+2.
128111010.baseFlair_:
Thank you! I promise I'll see this match through. We'll definitely win this tournament!
—Itsuki Mitsutagawa
128111010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128111010.evoFlair_:
This time, I'm not playing as just plain old Itsuki. I'm Seventh Flame's team captain, and they're all counting on me!
—Itsuki Mitsutagawa

128111020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: If any allied followers that cost 1 play point or less are in play, return 1 to your hand, summon a Salvia Panther, and give it +1/+0.
128111020.baseFlair_:
I won't lose—not to you!
—Itsuki Mitsutagawa
128111020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128111020.evoFlair_:
I'm not some "weakling"! My name... IS ITSUKI!
—Itsuki Mitsutagawa

129111010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Return another allied follower or amulet to your hand.
129111010.baseFlair_: Hmph. Don't get me wrong, human. I didn't save you because we're friends. Losing a proficient smith would be a loss, that's all. Where else in the world would I find gear that fits my needs so well? Do you know how hard it would be to find a replacement?!
129111010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
129111010.evoFlair_: Look at the solid craftsmanship of this blade! It's well-balanced and cuts like a dream! I hate to admit it, but I'd take man-made steel over elven-wood gear any day of the week! Damn it, human... I may not like you, but I can't be mad at your work!

129111030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand. Draw a card. Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower and then the enemy leader.
Enhance (7): Deal 5 damage instead. Gain +5/+5.
129111030.baseFlair_: Those blasted fairies said a blind archer could hit a target with more accuracy than me. Fools. As if I don't also have a sword. They wouldn't be in this bloody mess if they hadn't gotten on my bad side.
129111030.evoFlair_: It's far more efficient to use fairies than to befriend them. After all, not only is it easier to use them as a tool, it's less aggravating too. Now, be a good target and let me test the sharpness of my blade.

100121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower if at least 2 other cards were played this turn.
100121020.baseFlair_: Atoms of steel, heed my call! Leave your Mother Earth behind and gather here! A cave this full of minerals will let me draw out my full power. Leave this place to me!
100121020.evoFlair_: Atoms of steel, pierce my enemies! Ha! That's about right. With elemental magic, form is everything—it's got to be elegant, precise, and stylish! The more witchy you look, the better the elements will flow!

101121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to all allied followers until the end of this turn.
101121020.baseFlair_: Now then: one, two, three, one, two, three—you there, stay in time!—two, three. Come on now! If you're enjoying this, put your whole body into it! Let's do this dance right!
101121020.evoFlair_: All right, it's festival day! As long as we all dance together, we can drive all our worries away! Now here we go! All together!

103121030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Transform an enemy follower into a Snowman.
103121030.baseFlair_: Sledding, snowball fights, and snowmen! I love playing in the snow!
103121030.evoFlair_: Snowmen are so big and silly! I think I'll make some more!

104121020.baseFlair_: Am I cute, or am I cute? Tee-hee-hee! If you don't like me when I'm fun-size, then I'll turn myself big!
104121020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain +2/+2 if at least 3 cards were played this turn.
104121020.evoFlair_: Hah, what do you think now? This is what happens when I bust out my teensy-weensy hammer. I won't stay this way long, but I bet I'll be more useful than before!

105121010.baseEffect_: Clash: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn.
105121010.baseFlair_: Hey, Bobo! Chop, chop! It's time for work! We'll cut down a thousand trees today!
105121010.evoFlair_: Bobo, I worked up a sweat, but I still have lots of energy. What do you say we cut down another thousand?

106121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Followers can't be played. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
106121010.baseFlair_: I wanna be a singer! Just listen. I practice like this every day: Eh-la-la-la-la! Huh, why's everybody holding their ears?
106121010.evoFlair_: I'm gonna be the best singer some day! Gotta practice! Gotta work every day, oh yeah! Duh-duh-duh-delicious destiny! It's my duh-duh-duh-dream!

107121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to another allied Forestcraft follower.
107121020.baseFlair_: What's with the prickly attitude? Don't get it twisted, I'm trying to help you out here! Now you're in for it—I'll spruce you up!
107121020.evoFlair_: Let's not beat around the bush, you've got me furious! No mercy for any of you saps—my wrath is one with the forest!

111121020.baseEffect_: Follower Strike: Until the end of your opponent's turn, change the enemy follower's attack to 0; and until the end of your turn, change this follower's attack to 0.
111121020.baseFlair_:
"I never asked to see it all..."
"But I see it anyway."
"I never asked to be a mind-reader."
"Someday, I wanna be a normal girl, y'know?"
111121020.evoFlair_:
"It's easier to be alone."
"But a girl likes to have company sometimes."
"I'm on my own..."
"It ain't easy bein' lonely!"

113121010.baseFlair_: As the youth hurried forward in search of help, there opened before him a glade of a thousand blossoms. The gentle elf standing within—messenger of the God Tree—extended her hand to the boy. —Prostrations before the God Tree, Chapter 2
113121010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Fairy Wisp and a Fairy into your hand.
113121010.evoFlair_: Answering the young man's cries, the God Tree made a kaleidoscopic protection bloom from the elf's outreached hand. And just as the gentle elf promised, the fairies guided the young man onward. —Prostrations before the God Tree, Chapter 3

114121020.baseEffect_:
At the end of your turn, if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, summon a Fairy.
Whenever an allied Fairy comes into play, give it +1/+1.
114121020.baseFlair_:
Lovely, lovely lady of the wood.
Drinks the lives of mortals and looks the way they should.
Enter not the forest, lest this fate you meet:
Eternity as soil beneath her shining feet.
—Woodland folk song
114121020.evoFlair_:
This woodland spirit is lovely to behold.
Her beautiful mien mimics those she has absorbed.
Seated atop the graves of intruders, she shines with purest light.
—Songs of the Unsullied Wood (Translation)

115121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand. If at least 3 allied Greenwood Guardians have been played this match, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
115121010.baseFlair_:
The branches beget leaves, bringing a wealth of blessings. When the time comes, the mighty warrior ushers in those who have shown gratitude for the forest's bounty.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 4
115121010.evoFlair_:
When the leaves flourish and the sapling evolves into a great tree, it drops new seeds to the ground. The guardian guides her sistren, nurturing them to become mighty warriors themselves.
—Teachings of the Great Forest, Part 5

116121010.baseEffect_: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a random Machina card with the lowest cost from your deck into your hand.
116121010.baseFlair_:
The iron harvested from beetle horns has made our weapons far more efficient. Metal is more durable and malleable than wood. Though accepting these changes gives me pause—when will we ourselves have to adapt?
—Forest Elf's Journal, Part 2
116121010.evoFlair_:
It is for the forest's sake that they've donned steel and brandished machinery. Though they have changed, the land has not. And they know it, as they find their ancestral home growing... outdated.
—On Flourishing, Part 2

119121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, summon a Stumpeye.
119121020.evoFlair_:
"And away we go! Make sure ya don't hold Mim back with all yer hot air!"
"You're one to talk. Make sure you don't get stuck in a rut and trip her up."
—A Certain Stump and Horn

120121020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Fairy.
Last Words: Put a Fairy into your hand.
120121020.baseFlair_: The whispers of the fairies guide my arrows: I just have to point and shoot, and the enemies scatter. There's no one better at confounding people than fairies, after all.
120121020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120121020.evoFlair_: The whispers of the fairies are meant to be taken with a dose of caution: sometimes they lead you down the wrong path entirely. After all, I'm human myself, and fairies love to play.

121121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
121121010.baseFlair_: Look at the size of this fruit... and not a blighted creature in sight, even in the heart of Asylum. I've got to tell Major Meow—I mean the Consul—about this find.
121121010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Change the cost of a random Naterran Great Tree in your hand to 0.
121121010.evoFlair_: Wait. You say you can eat these tough fruits? What did you call them again? Parts? And you don't eat them, you use them for up... grades? Hmm. I don't get it, but if there are this many sprouting everywhere, that means you can stay with us for a long time, huh?

122121030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any allied followers that cost 1 play point or less are in play, return 1 to your hand and gain +1/+0 and Storm.
122121030.baseFlair_: Once, a wicked wolfman broke into an alchemist's secret garden. With a wave of her wand, the plants bared their thorny fangs at him—and swallowed her whole.
122121030.evoFlair_: Once, a hunter tracked a wolf to an overgrown garden—only to find a wolfen man waiting for him with a wicked staff and terrible grin.

715121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If any allied followers that cost 1 play point or less are in play, return 1 to your hand and gain +1/+0 and Storm.
715121010.baseFlair_: The secluded garden, overgrown with carnivorous flora, hid a powerful treasure—the Phantombloom Staff. Captivated, a young elf snuck past the rusted gates.
715121010.evoFlair_: By the time the elf's hand closed around the staff, it was too late. The carnivorous flowers' bait had successfully lured another victim to their fate.

123121030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
Whenever an effect decreases an enemy follower's attack or defense, draw a card.
123121030.baseFlair_: We must never spare life. We must uproot the sickly trees by our own hand—we can always plant new saplings to preserve the forest. The teachings implore us to kill to protect the greater dignity of life.
123121030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give -4/-0 to an enemy follower.
Whenever an effect decreases an enemy follower's attack or defense, draw a card.
123121030.evoFlair_: The Ten Omens were returned to the world on a tablet of sapphire stone. Carved into a new column was the next Trial of Unkilling—Annihilation. Disciples spilled out of the woods, delivering untold death and suffering unto the masses.

124121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give a follower in your hand the following effect - When this follower leaves play, summon a Fairy.
124121010.baseFlair_:
A spread fit for royalty, featuring delicacies from every season. Whether you fancy a fried fritter or a savory soup, our no-frills cuisine is sure to delight the senses.
—Ancient Bamboo Inn, II
124121010.evoFlair_:
I'm pleased to see everything was to your liking! The innkeeper is well known for her cooking around these parts, actually... Your pajamas are right over here, so feel free to change while we prepare your bedding!
—Elven Waitress

126121030.baseFlair_: Feeling thirsty? Then step on up and take a look at my wares! And these apples I'm carryin'? A local specialty! They're so juicy that one bite'll be enough to quench any thirst! Elven produce just hits different, you know?
126121030.evoFlair_: Another day, another bountiful harvest! I may not be able to grow these babies, but I sure know how to sell 'em! Keeping my customers' mouths watering and my pocketbook lined—that's two birds with one stone!

127121010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Add 1 to the number of cards played this turn.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, if at least 4 cards were played this turn, deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower.
127121010.baseFlair_:
I had a child. An only child, cut from the same cloth as his father. Stern-looking, but sweet and pleasant once you got him talking. I can't retire... not until I've taught him the way of the forest—and how to survive.
—Den of Winds: Memories of a Convict, Part 3
127121010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
127121010.evoFlair_:
Once, a group of rowdy upstarts tried to stage a coup. How many of those fools my son and I cut down, I can't quite recall... But I do remember the thrill. It was as if I was fighting side by side with my husband again.
—Den of Winds: Memories of a Convict, Part 4

127121020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Increase your leader's maximum defense by 1 and restore 1 defense to your leader. If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, draw a card.
127121020.baseFlair_:
After watching Subaru battle, all my children are raring to go as well! I think Seventh Flame is a wonderful club!
—Fuwari Hahajima
127121020.evoFlair_:
Hehe. Maybe the members of Seventh Flame will actually get Haruma to change his ways?
—Fuwari Hahajima

129121010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Neutral follower from your deck into your hand.
129121010.baseFlair_:
I wasn't sure what to think when Canon brought in a boy without a stitch of clothing on his back, but the house has been a lot livelier since you came. You can stay with us until your memories... Actually, you can stay forever.
—Lain, A Hero's Tale, Pt. 5
129121010.evoFlair_:
You've become very good at crafting lucky talismans, Kyrie. Your presence really lights up the room—everyone smiles more when you're around. I just hope we can continue to live together peacefully...
—Lain, A Hero's Tale, Pt. 5

900121010.baseFlair_: That distinct, high-pitched buzz is a telltale sign that the assassins of the forest have arrived. They wield their poison stingers with exceptional mastery, flitting around their prey before going in for the kill.
900121010.evoFlair_: When their victims run, they go for the back; when their victims don't, they go for the heart. The sinister drone of their wings is almost assuredly the sound of a life about to be lost.

101131020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: For each other card played this turn, gain +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
101131020.baseFlair_: It was a small enough creature at first. But when granted new power by a witch, it began to swell, its carapace growing thicker...
101131020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101131020.evoFlair_: Its dully glowing eyes betray no feeling, and even screams of agony cannot reach its ears. Controlled by a witch, the creature uses its wicked horns to make a game of wreaking havoc.

102131030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied followers the following effect until the end of your opponent's turn - Reduce damage from effects to 0.
102131030.baseFlair_: I love this forest, and I want to help all my friends there!
102131030.evoFlair_: You can count on me! I'd do anything to help out my friends and forest!

107131010.baseFlair_: People call me the best blacksmith in the forest. Humph, it's not like I'm amazing or anything, everyone else here is just sloppy.
107131010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If you've played at least 3 cards this turn, give another allied follower +1/+0 and Rush. Reduce damage to that follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
107131010.evoFlair_: I-I'm sorry for being mean! I mean, I thought that blacksmiths were supposed to act cool and stuff... Was I wrong? Is this why I have no friends?

108131010.baseEffect_: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, and you have at least 2 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Paula, Gentle Warmth or Paula, Passionate Warmth.
108131010.baseFlair_: I can't say I see too clearly yet... what it looks like when I love. But little by little I'm beginning to understand.
108131010.evoFlair_: My love for you shows itself in my wish to serve. With this power that you gave me, I'll serve the people with everything I've got.

108131030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Skystride Raptor into your hand.
108131030.baseFlair_: There are no walls between man and beast. Given love, compassion, and openness, we are one and the same.
108131030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give Bane to all Skystride Raptors in your hand.
108131030.evoFlair_: I am you, and you are me. Let us run, and let us fly. This is the hour of the hunt!

110131030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, give +1/+0 to all allied followers. Then if at least 4 other cards were played this turn, give +0/+1 to all allied followers.
110131030.baseFlair_:
Her guileless voice rings out in the halls of the crystal palace, urging everyone to partake in celebration of the holy day.
"Welcome to the crystal palace! Come dance with me!"
110131030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +2/+2 to another allied follower.
110131030.evoFlair_:
Music descends from on high, covering the city of Crystalia like a blanket of snow. Only she knows the magic spell to put a smile on everyone's face.
"I'm having the time of my life! How about you?"

113131020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Return another allied follower or amulet to your hand. If it's a Machina card, draw a card.
113131020.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new breakthrough after another. One can either eliminate enemies of the woodland or expand the forest itself. These ideas are opposed to the ones expressed by the Mechalance Elf. —Veteran Researcher's Report, Vol. 2
113131020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113131020.evoFlair_: The mechanical lance you bear is lovely enough... But enemies should be welcomed with open arms rather than expelled. They'll never leave the forest—I'll never let them. —Guard of the Machinatree to Mechalance Elf

114131020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Fairy into your hand. If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, put 2 Fairies into your hand instead and gain Rush.
114131020.baseFlair_:
Prideful, prideful god of all that grows.
Creation's dawn is in its whorls—the secrets it knows.
Die and fall beneath its till—become one with the past.
To be the future's soil is the only way to last.
—Woodland folk song
114131020.evoFlair_:
The embodiment of a forest's growth is prideful in nature.
It is an avatar of the world's inception.
It ushers all life toward the dead past, tilling it into the future's soil.
—Songs of the Unsullied Wood (Translation)

115131020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Deal 2 or 4 damage to all enemy followers. (Damage is determined randomly for each enemy.)
115131020.baseFlair_: Leave it to me, big bro! I'll shoot down every last one of your enemies! After all, the odds of me hitting my mark are a hundred to one! Wait a sec... That's not much, is it?
115131020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain +2/+0 until the end of the turn. Add 2 to the number of cards played this turn.
115131020.evoFlair_: I didn't want you to see me missing any targets, so I've been practicing in secret! Now I've got the power of a hundred! Hopefully I can keep it up and pierce your heart someday too, big bro... Hehe!

115131030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Greenwood Guardian into your hand.
115131030.baseFlair_: I'd describe myself as powerless ivy, while the forest guardians are more like mighty trees... Oh how I wish I could be like them. I will adorn the great warriors with flowers, so that the forest may continue to propagate and conquer this land.

115131030.evoFlair_: To the guardians, I'm no more than a twig. We're as different as a tiny bud and a great tree. But all buds will one day bloom, painting the land like a flower garden.

118131020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Evolve this follower.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
118131020.baseFlair_:
Yup yup, I'm small and that's A-OK! At least, that's what my gut tells me. It's also telling me this is the right way to go!
...Whoopsie. It was a dead end.
118131020.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of different allied amulets that have left play this match.
118131020.evoFlair_: With one whack of my teensy-weensy mallet, I go from fun-sized to serious-sized! Now that my instincts are working properly, let's see... All right, we're supposed to go the opposite direction! I just know it!

119131030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Clash: Give the enemy follower -2/-0.
119131030.baseFlair_: People in my hometown would often say I remind them of a cat. They'd ask me to do my "usual thing." Um... What's my "usual thing," you say? Well... It's... talking like a cat... meow.
119131030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Young Cat into your hand.
Clash: Give the enemy follower -2/-0.
119131030.evoFlair_: I always wanted to see the world beyond my home, but when I actually did, there was so much that took me by surprise. For example, people don't normally scale cliffs or climb trees, right? Then... does that mean gifting someone with something I've hunted is also not normal?

123131010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give +0/+2 to another allied follower. If that follower is evolved, evolve this follower.
123131010.baseFlair_: Up, up, up goes the forest's energy. There, that ought to do it. The leaves wouldn't stop rustling until I came here... What a pain. Slap on some medicinal herbs next time because I won't be coming to your rescue again... Hehe.
123131010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, fully restore all allied followers' defense.
123131010.evoFlair_:
"Wow, Lena! There's actually someone with a sharper tongue than you!"
"Excuse me? Have you looked in a mirror, Lina?"
"Our words..." "...say the opposite of what we mean!"
—Lina & Lena, Twin Souls

124131020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If allied followers have evolved at least 5 times this match, gain Last Words - Summon a Fairytale Prince and give it Storm.
124131020.baseFlair_:
His wings are imbued with the blessing of two fairies of light and wind—a symbol of their affection.
"Nnngh, you two're too cute! I dunno what I'd do without you."
"Squeee! Reeeeally?" "We'll stay with you forever!"
124131020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
124131020.evoFlair_:
The blade he wields is a sword of forest royalty—a symbol of their adoration.
"Ah, another fan of mine?"
"Swooooon!" "We love you, our one and only prince!"

126131010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 2 from the cost of a Forestcraft follower in your hand (excluding Slade, Blossoming Wolf) until the end of the turn.
126131010.baseFlair_:
Shadowverse is way more than just the battles! It's also about bonding with the cards, and with friends and rivals alike!
—Itsuki Mitsutagawa
126131010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Change an enemy follower's attack to 1 until the end of your opponent's turn. If X is at least 5, change the attack of all enemy followers instead. X equals the number of times an allied effect has returned 1 or more cards to a player's hand this match.
126131010.evoFlair_:
Finally, it's also about bonding with the Digital Friends and having them as partners! I don't want to lose to anyone who would deny that bond!
—Itsuki Mitsutagawa

126131030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Fairy into your hand.
Whenever an allied Fairy comes into play, give it Rush.
126131030.baseFlair_: Welcome to our kingdom, dear traveler! Please allow me to utilize my royal elven guiding skills to show you around. I trust that the spirits who watch over these lands will welcome you as well... Probably. Yes, I'm sure they will!
126131030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Fairy into your hand and change its cost to 0.
Whenever an allied Fairy comes into play, give it Rush.
126131030.evoFlair_: I've mastered countless elven skills and enchantments, and yet... I still cannot see the spirits. I must persevere! I know that I will be able to see them someday!

127131010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Add 1 to the number of cards played this turn.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, if at least 4 cards were played this turn, draw a card and evolve this follower.
127131010.baseFlair_:
Things were going smoothly—especially after I set my son up to become a lieutenant in the Ring. Unfortunately, some people weren't all too happy with me—I had chosen to kill our great advisor, after all.
—Den of Winds: Memories of a Convict, Part 5
127131010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
127131010.evoFlair_:
Our "advisor" was an ancient talking tree—a symbol of the history of the Verdant Ring. To cut it down was to spit in the face of tradition... An act akin to patricide. I began to hear whispering—that I'd gone mad with power.
—Den of Winds: Memories of a Convict, Part 6

128131010.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Forestcraft cards
Whenever a follower that originally costs at least 2 play points is fused to this card, if you have at least 20 cards in your deck, put a copy of it into your deck.
----------
Rush.

128131010.baseFlair_:
One time, a guest helped us cook, and I'll never forget the doofy grin on my sis's face when she dug into the chicken. Ever since, I've been working on a recipe to bring tourists back to our sleepy little town.
—Vitherwood School of Agriculture, Term 303 Applicant
128131010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128131010.evoFlair_:
Agriculture and culinary science were the perfect combo. Her Resplendent Roast Chicken was an instant hit with kids and won the Imperial Cookoff ten years straight, attracting gourmet tourists from far and wide.
—Vitherwood Alum Spotlight #3

900131020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Return an allied follower or amulet to your hand.
900131020.baseFlair_: What does my love look like? It's still a little blurry, but... I feel like I have an idea.
900131020.evoFlair_: My love looks like passion! I wanna use this new power that you gave me... and help people share some excitement of their own!

900131030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower.
900131030.baseFlair_: What does my love look like? I'm not totally sure, but... I feel like I'm on to something.
900131030.evoFlair_: My love looks like trust. I want to use the power you gave me to help people connect with each other!

105141020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Add X to this follower's attack. X equals the number of allied Fairies that have been destroyed during this match.
105141020.baseFlair_: Thou art a torrent in the verdant depths. Thou art burgeoning might and volition given shape. Within thy diminutive frame dwelleth the forest's prodigious rage.
105141020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105141020.evoFlair_: From thy maw, O dragon, doth issue a roar to shake all trees. It is the sound of the ire of the persecuted. For thou art a great protector who doth consume all defilers of the forest.

107141020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the number of cards played this turn, including this card.
107141020.baseFlair_: As if a pestilent fog enshrouding the world in shadow, they came. The darkness consumed the sky, until all that remained to consume was us. —The Insect Chronicles, Final Chapter
107141020.evoFlair_: "The imminent darkness slowly consumed the sky as the sun abandoned us in the shadows to be consumed. Oh heavens, have merc..." —The Insect Chronicles, Fragment of unfinished page

112141020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of other Machina cards in your hand.
112141020.baseFlair_: It's thanks to the miraculous development of robotics that a warrior of his caliber has appeared in the forest. Finding both the wooden and iron weapons of the past insufficient, he carves out the future of the elves with his mechanical blades. —Researcher's Report, Part 4
112141020.evoEffect_: Evolve: If at least 3 cards have been played this turn, deal 2 damage to an enemy.
112141020.evoFlair_: I am without equal, a lord of new techniques that rival even a thousand strong. The logic behind these twin blades is foolproof—twice the weaponry, twice the fallen foes. Even the world beyond the forest will come to know my power.

115141020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw a card. If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, draw 2 cards instead.
Union Burst (10): Give +1/+1 to all allied followers. Restore 3 defense to your leader.
115141020.baseFlair_: My name is Kokkoro, and I have been charged to act as your guide. It is my duty to protect and look after you, my lord. I'm honored to make your acquaintance.
115141020.evoFlair_: I am the happiest person in the world to have the pleasure of serving you, my lord. Please allow me to remain by your side always.

121141030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 2 other cards were played this turn, summon a Forest Guardian's Bow.
Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
121141030.baseFlair_: The archer journeys in search of her other half. Though her yearning is marred by jealousy, her heart retains its kindness. It is that which makes her fit to lead and receive the goddess's blessing. With greensong in her heart and justice to guide her bow, she forges ahead.
121141030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Choose - Put a Gale Arrow or Storm Arrow into your hand.
Whenever this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
121141030.evoFlair_: I know I'm weak... I overthink and worry about things a lot. But if I give up without even trying, then I won't be able to save anyone. That's why hope is so important—it's what keeps me going even in the darkest times. And my hope is in my heart and my friends!

122141020.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Fairies

Bane.

122141020.baseFlair_:
Sorry, playtime's over. With people like you, it's best to fight with the gloves off. And fair warning—things are about to get intense. Now, dance for me, won't you?
—Vanessa Joubert
122141020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
122141020.evoFlair_:
I have to say, I'm disappointed. That sweet naivety of yours is holding you back. But don't worry—I can fix that for you. Run rampant until everything has melted away... Noxious Elf!
—Vanessa Joubert

123141010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)

123141010.evoEffect_:
Ward.

123141010.evoFlair_: The forest's breath imbues him with strength, healing the ravaging pains of age. His life is not his own, for he is a steward. The trial overcome, the forest swells with the song of victory. "My blade shall reach ever-loftier heights."

124141030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can evolve for 0 evolution points.
124141030.baseFlair_: The primordial tree of creation which nurtures the growth of worlds. Its verdant blessing, pure love. Its bountiful harvest, forever benevolent.

Ward.

124141030.evoFlair_: The great mother, creator of all life. Her eyes watch over each and every one of her children, all beloved and all nurtured by creation.

125141020.baseEffect_: Invocation: Whenever you play a card, if it's the fourth card you've played this turn, invoke this card. Then, return it to your hand and change its cost to 1.
125141020.baseFlair_: All weapons are forged with an ember of their creator's soul. The ember is warm and precious... but also fragile. I'm not a warrior, but hearing their cries breaks my heart, so I'll do what I can!
125141020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Evolve an unevolved allied Forestcraft follower. (Evolve effects will not activate.)
125141020.evoFlair_: You can't control someone's heart—it belongs to that person, and they decide who they give it to. Your words have humbled this degenerate old man... You've grown into a wonderful person, and I couldn't be prouder, Rayne. —Alba, Dark Elf Conductor
